md:
giải nghĩa từ "knocking" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Knocking (verb)
	* Meaning: to hit or strike something gently, often repeatedly, especially to attract attention or to signal something.
	* Vietnamese: gõ, đập, chạm.
	* Example sentence: "She was knocking on the door to wake him up."
	* Related words: knock, tap, hit, strike.

2. Knocking (noun)
	* Meaning: the act of hitting or striking something gently, often repeatedly.
	* Vietnamese: tiếng gõ, tiếng đập.
	* Example sentence: "The knocking on the wall was driving me crazy."
	* Related words: tap, hit, strike, bang.

Note: The verb "knocking" can also be used to describe the sound of something hitting or striking something else, such as "the knocking of the engine" or "the knocking of the pipes".

  2. Knocking (noun)

    • Vietnamese: tiếng gõ, tiếng đập.
    • Example sentence: "The knocking on the wall was driving me crazy."
    • Related words: tap, hit, strike, bang.

Note: The verb "knocking" can also be used to describe the sound of something hitting or striking something else, such as "the knocking of the engine" or "the knocking of the pipes".
